alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Taylor; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 2:59PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A gust front will impact portions of Wakulla, central Gadsden, northeastern Liberty, southwestern Jefferson, central Taylor, southwestern Leon and northeastern Franklin Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 258 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a gust front along a line extending from near Quincy to 11 miles south of Midway to 23 miles east of St. Marks to 13 miles southeast of Perry. Movement was south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds 35 to 40 mph ahead of thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Woodville, Quincy, St. Marks, Crawfordville, Wakulla, Gretna, Sopchoppy, Pinland, Newport, Shadeville, Leon Sinks, Jug Island, Douglas City, Wakulla Springs, Panacea, Scanlon, Dekle Beach, Medart, Buckhorn and Jack Lee Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These gusty winds will occur ahead of thunderstorms.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Taylor; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty
